title: Do you think that the laws of thermodynamics in quantum systems could contribute to technologies such as more efficient engines? - Quora

response.answer_text: While I agree with Robert Naumann, it is also clear that quantum mechanics in general, and entanglement in particular, lead to subtle new clauses, at least, to be inserted into our current laws of thermodynamics. If you are interested, the New Scientist magazine had an article on quantum thermodynamics a couple of years ago (07-Apr-2018, page 32).
Don’t see how quantum mechanics could contribute to a better understanding of the laws of thermodynamics, which have been well understood and exploited for the past hundred years or so.
